entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
